game.name: Battle Ram
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "배틀 램"은 로봇과 싸우는 배틀 램에 관한 재미있는 아케이드 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Battle Ram - an experiment of scientists developed in a secret laboratory, a powerful creature against robots, who will win?

reviewHighlights.text: Got a free key. Beat it in under an hour. Price is way too inflated. Not worth your time. Run.
